mapper.select: select user_id userId, mobile mobile, realname realname, password password, email email, roleid roleId, isleader isLeader, orgid orgId, landline_id landlineId, job_id jobId from yjs_user where user_id = #{userId}

select user_id userId, mobile mobile, realname realname, password password, email email, roleid roleId, isleader isLeader, orgid orgId, landline_id landlineId, job_id jobId from yjs_user where orgid = #{orgId} and isleader = 1 and roleid = 2

select user_id userId, mobile mobile, realname realname, password password, email email, roleid roleId, isleader isLeader, orgid orgId, landline_id landlineId, job_id jobId from yjs_user where mobile = #{username} and password = #{password}
